item.description:
Ticket prices are $42.50. Please follow the link to this website to learn more about the event and purchase your ticket...http://www.beersummit.com/

There are 3 sessions you can choose from to attend:

Session 1: Fri Night 5:30- 9pm

Session 2: Sat Day 12:30- 4pm

Session 3: Sat Night 5:30- 9pm

I attended this event last summer and found the Saturday night session to be awesome because we could continue our partying at neighboring bars once the event was over. The COOLEST part about the event was that a giant game of flip cup broke out...we had 6 tables worth of people playing for hours!

List of Breweres: 50 Back, Affligem, Berkshire Brewing, Blue Hills, Boulder, Brooklyn, Buffalo Bill's, Cape Ann, Cape Cod, Cisco, Clown Shoes, Franziskaner, Gardner Ale House, Geary's, Gerbs Pumpkin Seeds, Gina Cigar, Harpoon, Heavy Seas, Innis & Gunn, JW Dundee, Ireland on the Road, Long Trail, Magic Hat, Mayflower, McNeill's, Mercury, Narragansett, New Century, Newport Storm, Offshore, Olde Burnside, Oskar Blues, Otter Creek, Paper City, Peak Organic, Sam Adams, Shipyard, Southern Tier, Spaten, Stawski Imports, Stiegl, Trinity Brewhouse, Tuckerman, Union Station Brewery, Weihenstephan, Widmer Bros, Woodchuck, Woodstock Inn, World Class Beer, Wormtown

The Castle is just off the Arlington (green line) stop.
item.why: Here's your chance to drink in a castle! If you've never attended this amazing beer tasting event, or even if you have, then you don't want to miss out on this one!
item.name: BeerSummit Boston
